title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Reactive Scaling: Optimizing Amazon EKS Cost and Performance (COP369)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越响应式扩展：优化 Amazon EKS 成本和性能 (COP369)
abstract: Traditional Kubernetes scaling on Amazon EKS often leads to a tradeoff between performance and cost. Reactive autoscaling based on utilization metrics can’t keep pace with dynamic workloads, resulting in wasted resources or degraded performance. This session introduces a proactive approach to resource management using workload-aware policies that distinguish between critical services and batch workloads. Attendees will learn how to apply demand forecasting to anticipate traffic patterns, implement pod-level Spot management to reduce EC2 spend by up to 70%, and design an automated control system that keeps EKS environments efficient, reliable, and production-ready at scale. This presentation is brought to you by ScaleOps, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 传统的Amazon EKS上的Kubernetes扩展往往导致性能和成本之间的权衡。基于利用率指标的响应式自动扩展无法跟上动态工作负载的步伐，导致资源浪费或性能下降。本次会议介绍了一种主动的资源管理方法，使用工作负载感知策略来区分关键服务和批处理工作负载。与会者将学习如何应用需求预测来预测流量模式，实施Pod级别的Spot管理以将EC2支出减少高达70%，并设计一个自动化控制系统，使EKS环境在大规模下保持高效、可靠和生产就绪。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ScaleOps为您呈现。
